CGRA Configuration Register File

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x40
Size:
0x14

Description

Registers needed to read/write CGRA tile configuration registers

Contents

Offset Identifier Name
0x00 addr CGRA Configuration Address Register
0x04 wr_data CGRA Configuration Data Register
0x08 write CGRA Configuration Write Enable Register
0x0C read CGRA Configuration Read Enable Register
0x10 rd_data CGRA Configuration Data Register
